forester
part of the DrWhy.AI developed by the MI^2 DataLab 0.1.0
  • Reference

Automated function for explaining ranger model

Source: R/make_ranger.R
make_ranger.Rd

Function make_ranger creates ranger model with default parameters using ranger library and wraps it with the explainer.

make_ranger(data, target, type)

Arguments

data

training set for ranger model. It can be data frame, matrix, data.table or dgCMatrix. Note: data should contain target column
target

name of a target value. Should be character. Has to be in data frame
type

specify weather it is classification task or regression. Should be one of these characters: "classif", "regr"

Value

An object of the class explainer.

References

Explanatory Model Analysis. Explore, Explain, and Examine Predictive Models. https://ema.drwhy.ai/

Examples

# \donttest{
# regression
library(DALEX)
data(apartments, package="DALEX")

exp <- make_ranger(apartments, "m2.price", "regression")

#> Preparation of a new explainer is initiated
#>   -> model label       :  Ranger 
#>   -> data              :  1000  rows  5  cols 
#>   -> target variable   :  1000  values 
#>   -> predict function  :  yhat.ranger  will be used (  default  )
#>   -> predicted values  :  No value for predict function target column. (  default  )
#>   -> model_info        :  package ranger , ver. 0.12.1 , task regression (  default  ) 
#>   -> predicted values  :  numerical, min =  1905.327 , mean =  3488.985 , max =  6189.334  
#>   -> residual function :  difference between y and yhat (  default  )
#>   -> residuals         :  numerical, min =  -414.7837 , mean =  -1.965983 , max =  597.1297  
#>   A new explainer has been created!  
#> Error in make_ranger(apartments, "m2.price", "regression"): nie znaleziono obiektu 'fmodel'
# plot(model_parts(exp))

# binary classification
library(DALEX)
data(titanic_imputed, package="DALEX")
exp <- make_ranger(titanic_imputed, "survived", "classification")

#> Preparation of a new explainer is initiated
#>   -> model label       :  Ranger 
#>   -> data              :  2207  rows  7  cols 
#>   -> target variable   :  2207  values 
#>   -> predict function  :  yhat.ranger  will be used (  default  )
#>   -> predicted values  :  No value for predict function target column. (  default  )
#>   -> model_info        :  package ranger , ver. 0.12.1 , task classification (  default  ) 
#>   -> predicted values  :  numerical, min =  0 , mean =  0.2084277 , max =  1  
#>   -> residual function :  difference between y and yhat (  default  )
#>   -> residuals         :  numerical, min =  -1 , mean =  0.113729 , max =  1  
#>   A new explainer has been created!  
#> Error in make_ranger(titanic_imputed, "survived", "classification"): nie znaleziono obiektu 'fmodel'
# plot(model_parts(exp))
# }
